00001 package modules.taskModule.entityDefinitions;
00002 
00003 import java.util.Hashtable;
00004 import java.util.Vector;
00005 
00006 import newtonERP.logging.Logger;
00007 import newtonERP.module.AbstractAction;
00008 import newtonERP.module.AbstractEntity;
00009 import newtonERP.module.AbstractOrmEntity;
00010 import newtonERP.module.BaseAction;
00011 import newtonERP.orm.Orm;
00012 import newtonERP.orm.associations.AccessorManager;
00013 import newtonERP.orm.associations.PluralAccessor;
00014 import newtonERP.orm.field.Field;
00015 import newtonERP.orm.field.Fields;
00016 import newtonERP.orm.field.type.FieldInt;
00017 import newtonERP.orm.field.type.FieldText;
00018 
00024 public class EffectEntity extends AbstractOrmEntity
00025 {
00028         public EffectEntity()
00029         {
00030                 super();
00031                 setVisibleName("Effet");
00032                 AccessorManager.addAccessor(this, new SearchEntity());
00033                 AccessorManager.addAccessor(this, new Parameter());
00034                 AccessorManager.addAccessor(this, new ActionEntity());
00035         }
00036 
00037         @Override
00038         public Fields initFields()
00039         {
00040                 Vector<Field<?>> fieldList = new Vector<Field<?>>();
00041                 fieldList.add(new FieldInt("Numéro", getPrimaryKeyName()));
00042                 fieldList.add(new FieldText("Description", "name", false));
00043                 fieldList.add(new FieldInt("Entité de recherche", new SearchEntity()
00044                                 .getForeignKeyName()));
00045                 fieldList.add(new FieldInt("Action", new ActionEntity()
00046                                 .getForeignKeyName()));
00047                 return new Fields(fieldList);
00048         }
00049 
00056         public AbstractEntity execute(Hashtable<String, String> entityParameters,
00057                         boolean isStraightSearch)
00058         {
00059                 AbstractEntity returnEntity = null;
00060 
00061                 Logger.info("[TASKMODULE] Exécution d'une tâche");
00062                 AbstractAction action = getAction();
00063                 Vector<AbstractOrmEntity> entityList = getAffectedEntityList(
00064                                 entityParameters, isStraightSearch);
00065                 for (AbstractOrmEntity entity : entityList)
00066                 {
00067                         if (action instanceof BaseAction)
00068                                 returnEntity = doBaseAction((BaseAction) action, entity,
00069                                                 getParameters(entity));
00070                         else
00071                                 returnEntity = action.doAction(entity, getParameters(entity));
00072                 }
00073 
00074                 return returnEntity;
00075         }
00076 
00077         private AbstractEntity doBaseAction(BaseAction baseAction,
00078                         AbstractOrmEntity entity, Hashtable<String, String> parameters)
00079 
00080         {
00081                 if (baseAction.getSystemName().equals("Get"))
00082                         return entity.getUI(parameters);
00083                 else if (baseAction.getSystemName().equals("Delete"))
00084                         return entity.deleteUI(parameters);
00085                 else if (baseAction.getSystemName().equals("New"))
00086                         return entity.newUI(parameters);
00087                 else if (baseAction.getSystemName().equals("GetList"))
00088                         return entity.getList(parameters);
00089                 else if (baseAction.getSystemName().equals("GetList"))
00090                         return entity.editUI(parameters);
00091                 throw new RuntimeException("Base Entity type not found");
00092         }
00093 
00094         private Vector<AbstractOrmEntity> getAffectedEntityList(
00095                         Hashtable<String, String> entityParameters, boolean isStraightSearch)
00096 
00097         {
00098                 AbstractOrmEntity searchEntity = getSearchEntity();
00099 
00100                 if (isStraightSearch)
00101                         searchEntity.setData(searchEntity.getPrimaryKeyName(),
00102                                         entityParameters.get(searchEntity.getPrimaryKeyName()));
00103 
00104                 return Orm.select(searchEntity);
00105         }
00106 
00107         private AbstractOrmEntity getSearchEntity()
00108         {
00109                 SearchEntity searchEntity = (SearchEntity) getSingleAccessor(new SearchEntity()
00110                                 .getForeignKeyName());
00111 
00112                 return searchEntity.getEntity();
00113         }
00114 
00115         private Hashtable<String, String> getParameters(AbstractOrmEntity entity)
00116 
00117         {
00118                 Hashtable<String, String> rawParameters = getRawParameters();
00119                 return parseDynamicParameters(rawParameters, entity);
00120         }
00121 
00122         private Hashtable<String, String> getRawParameters()
00123         {
00124                 Hashtable<String, String> rawParameters = new Hashtable<String, String>();
00125 
00126                 PluralAccessor parameterList = this.getPluralAccessor("Parameter");
00127 
00128                 Parameter parameter;
00129                 for (AbstractOrmEntity entity : parameterList)
00130                 {
00131                         parameter = (Parameter) entity;
00132                         rawParameters.put(parameter.getKey(), parameter.getValue());
00133                 }
00134 
00135                 return rawParameters;
00136         }
00137 
00138         private Hashtable<String, String> parseDynamicParameters(
00139                         Hashtable<String, String> parameters, AbstractOrmEntity entity)
00140         {
00141                 String value;
00142                 for (String key : parameters.keySet())
00143                 {
00144                         value = parameters.get(key);
00145                         for (String variable : entity.getFields().getKeyList())
00146                         {
00147                                 value = replaceToEntityFieldValue(entity, value, variable);
00148                                 parameters.put(key, value);
00149                         }
00150                 }
00151 
00152                 return parameters;
00153         }
00154 
00155         private String replaceToEntityFieldValue(AbstractOrmEntity entity,
00156                         String value, String variable)
00157         {
00158 
00159                 return value.replace(":" + entity.getSystemName() + "." + variable,
00160                                 entity.getDataString(variable));
00161         }
00162 
00163         private AbstractAction getAction()
00164         {
00165                 ActionEntity actionEntity = getActionEntity();
00166 
00167                 if (BaseAction.isNameMatchesBaseAction(actionEntity.getActionName()))
00168                         return actionEntity.getBaseAction(getSearchEntity());
00169                 return actionEntity.getAction();
00170         }
00171 
00172         private ActionEntity getActionEntity()
00173         {
00174                 return (ActionEntity) getSingleAccessor(new ActionEntity()
00175                                 .getForeignKeyName());
00176         }
00177 }
